EmailTemplate.subject: Attending AMTC 2016? We have your Helicopter Air Ambulance solutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ARE YOU PREPARED FOR THE HELICOPTER AIR AMBULANCE MANDATE? HAA MANDATE IS COMING SOON! Mission readiness is a requirement when every minute counts and saving lives demands quick response times. Honeywell's Aspire 200 and Sky Connect Tracker deliver reliable satellite communications and flight data monitoring that make a difference in the Golden Hour. In addition, our Health and Usage Monitoring System provides operators with a range of diagnostic tools to keep equipment at optimum operating condition and ready at a moment's notice. SCHEDULE A MEETING <[[mailto:iain.ronis@honeywell.com]]> Honeywell representatives will join our partners at the Air Medical Transport Conference - AMTC 2016 from December 13-15 in Charlotte, NC. You can learn more about our products at the following booths:
- AeroDynamix - #729
- Diagnostic Solutions, Inc. - #818
- Mecaer Aviation Group - #828
- Troo Tracking - #1119
- Truth Data Insights - #918
If you have further questions or would like to schedule a meeting at AMTC 2016, please contact Iain Ronis, Product Manager for Sky Connect and Helicopter Flights Services: 240-638-2579 or email: iain.ronis@honeywell.com <[[mailto:iain.ronis@honeywell.com]]>. © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[ttps://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://m.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Sign up for the Helicopter Newsletter here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/newsletter]]> Learn more about Sky Connect. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/sky-connect-tracker-systems]]> This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}.
